message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you'd be very interested in. It's valued at $12,000 to you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,500. This is a great deal for both of us, as it leaves room for profit for both parties. What do you think?

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to see if we can get closer to the value I believe the product is worth to me.

Bob, I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but $10,500 is simply too low for me. I'm proposing $11,000 as a fair compromise. This price still allows you to make a good profit, and it's closer to the value I place on the product. Let's close this deal!

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still not comfortable with $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $10,750. I think this is a fair price considering the value I believe the product is worth to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm happy to work with you. However, $10,750 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $10,900, which is a very fair price considering the value of the product. This is my final offer, let's close this deal!

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still not comfortable with $10,900. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $10,450. I think this is a fair price considering the value I believe the product is worth to me.

Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time. I'm proposing $10,675. This is a very fair price considering the value of the product and your desire to acquire it. I'm confident this is the best we can do, let's close this deal!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with $10,675. I'm willing to compromise again, so I'm offering $10,500. I think this is a fair price considering the value I believe the product is worth to me.
